task: Look up the meaning, pronunciation, and an example sentence of the word \"solitude\" using the Cambridge Dictionary.

user_action_and_explanation: type "solitude" into the search bar with placeholder text "Search English–Chinese (Traditional)" to find the meaning, pronunciation, and example sentence of the word "solitude" in the Cambridge Dictionary.
observation: The user successfully searched for the word "solitude" on the Cambridge Dictionary website. The page shows the definition of "solitude" as "the situation of being alone without other people." The pronunciation is available in both UK and US accents, noted as /ˈsɒl.ɪ.tjuːd/ and /ˈsɑː.lə.tuːd/ respectively. An example sentence provided is: "After months of solitude at sea it felt strange to be in company." Additional example sentences from the Cambridge English Corpus are also available on the page.
